game:pipeleaf-guide-text:
Pipeleaf Guide A smoking mod
Basics
This mod adds craftable smoking pipes which, when used with prepared shag, can grant player buffs and debuffs. To use the a pipe you must have smokable shag in your inventory (more below) then hold down right mouse button to inhale. You will see smoke coming out of the bowl if you are consuming herb. Vinalla plants include Golden Poppy, Cornflower, and Orange Mallow. Install the Wildcraft mod to get access to more processible plants.
Crafting Pipes
Clay pipe made of clay and then fired. To build the Briar Burl Pipe you must track down a Briar Burl by digging up Tree Heath with a shovel. It is rare so keep an eye out!
Preparing Shag
Some cut flowers and herbs (from Wildcraft mod) can be placed in a firepit to be fire-cured. Then, grind the fired-cured material in a quern to produce shag. Based on the source plant material, different effects are applied when smoked. Check the Handbook shag item types to learn what plants produce what effects!
Cultivating Pipeleaf and Creating Blends
A new crop called Pipeleaf can be found in rainy temperate climates. Pipeleaf can be cultivated to produce Pipeleaf Shag. Using Pipeleaf Shag as a base, you can mix together two herb shags to produce a blend that combines some of the effects of both herbs!
game:blockdesc-flower-treeheath-*: Break with a shovel for a change to find a Briar Burl, an ingredient in the Briar Burl Smoking Pipe.
itemdesc-*smokingpipe-*: Hold right mouse button to inhale smokable herbs.
